column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This restaurant definitely lived up to its reputation. The ambience
column3: and service were all so great. Honestly the only complain I have was the wait
column4: but the food definitely made it all worth it. When we visited
column5: we got the takuyaki and I legit almost cried. It was to the point where we left and went on the rest of the day and I was still thinking about it. I was also really content with my ramen of choice
column7: it was so good. The only thing was that it has thick noodles and be mindful of that. For a small girl like me
column8: I couldn't finish the bowl because the noodles were super filling and heavy on your stomach. But the broth was super good.
